name: IsContractBatcher
description: IsContractBatcher. Identifies whether an address is contract.

functionDecorators.name: isContract
functionDecorators.description: Check whether an address is a contract.

returnDecorators.description: bool true if _addr is a contract.

returnDecorators.name: areContracts
returnDecorators.description: an array of isContract calls corresponding to each address in _addrs.
